tool_description: A Twitter monitoring tool API that allows users to find mentions of their brand, competitors, or any other specified queries on Twitter.

api_list.name: GetMentions
api_list.description: This API function retrieves mentions of a specified query across Twitter, helping users monitor their brand presence or competitor activity.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search term or query for which mentions are to be retrieved.

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description: The time period for which to retrieve mentions, specified in days.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number for pagination of results.
